name: LeaveYourGunsAtHome
description:
Howdy, pardner. Just another day in the desert, ain't it? 

The best way to play this game would be to turn on a country radio to play in the background. I'd recomend searching one out on https://tunein.com/

Hint: the game never ends.

This is my entry for Ludum Dare 46: Keep it alive.

Controls: 

A and D to walk

Software I used to create this game:
  • Unity
  • piskelapp.com
